definition: ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous

sentences.english: Polar bears hunt ringed seals, which live under the Arctic ice.
sentences.chinese: 北极熊猎食住在北极冰层下的环斑海豹。

sentences.english: If the leopard seal loses its grip, the penguin will make a break for it.
sentences.chinese: 如果斑海豹松开口，企鹅就会奋力逃生。

sentences.english: Tian Jiguang, the head of the Panjin Larga Seal Protection Society.
sentences.chinese: 田继光，盘锦市保护斑海豹协会会长。

sentences.english: Ringed seal pups are reared in snow dens.
sentences.chinese: 环斑海豹通常在洞穴的底部生育。

definition: (bird species of China) oriental stork (Ciconia boyciana)
(bird species of China) whooper swan (Cygnus cygnus)
(bird species of China) black-faced spoonbill (Platalea minor)
(bird species of China) white-tailed eagle (Haliaeetus albicilla)
(bird species of China) Saunders's gull (Chroicocephalus saundersi)

(bird species of China) Chinese egret (Egretta eulophotes)
